data.title: Umicore SA/NV/Umicore NV/SA / Bart Sap, Chief Executive Officer
data.text:
Subject matters were not required to be associated with subject matter details when this content was submitted

Steps taken to obtain financial assistance (grants, loans, tax holiday or other) from the Federal government, among other things through the Strategic Innovation Fund (SIF) program, the nature and amounts of which are still unknown. The financing will be used to build a precursor and cathode active materials production plant including the purchase of equipment for its production activities.

Grant, Contribution or Other Financial Benefit
